short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension add GAYA click2call solution

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Click2Call generic CRM extension for COPERATO clients allows you to use any CRM with COPERATO's PBX hosted services. No need in complex integrations, just install, configure and start talking!
